item.title: Range
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Chimaera God:

does ranging levels affect you overall combat level…???

In a word, yes.

The highest combination of skills affects your combat level. If your att and strength combined is higher, then you are melee based and your range/mage levels do not affect your cb. If your range is higher than mage and att/str combined, then you are range based and mage/att/str don’t affect your cb. If your mage is higher than range and att/str combined, then you are mage based and range/att/str don’t affect your cb. HP, def, and pray always influence your cb.

Your attack plus strength times 2/3 gives you the equivalent range/mage level.
With 60 att and 60 strength, you would have the equivalent cb of a 80 range, 80 mage.

Read full topic
